attributes.action: to make sure all pensioners on pension credit get the warm front allowance.
attributes.additional_details: at the moment all pensioners on guaranteed credit are eligible for the £120 warm front rebate from their energy supplier,but do not qualify if they get savings credit.this is totally unfair because at the end of the day they still only recieve the same gross total of pension credit.this is not fair and all recipiants of pension credit should recieve it.
